name: Airport Commandos (17+) - Elite Counter Terrorism Sniper 2
name_original: Airport Commandos (17+) - Elite Counter Terrorism Sniper 2
description:
** HEADSHOTS, SNIPER KILLS, AND MORE! **
** AWESOME SNIPER SHOOTER ACTION! **

You're a member of an elite strike force on a mission to rescue a group of hostages that have taken over an airport. One by one you take the bad guys out, while trying to save the hostages. Will you come out victorious?

FEATURES

- Machine gun & sniper views.
- Multiple environments.
- Headshots, zoomed in sniper shots, and more!
- Awesome soundtrack.
